Text:
U r right what u r sharing is the Panzer Corps PC Digital version, and thats the original size. If someone like the game, please dont forget to buy it...

http://www.slitherine.com/games/panzer_corps_pc
(official page of the game)

BTW the game is quite short, I finished in just 7 hours...IDK if they r gonna develop another campaign or what...but they should cause the game is quite impressive but quite short as well...

I will try it and see and if it works without breaking the game, I will post back to confirm if it does or doesn't.

Nah, wants a valid serial number when I try to install it :-/. Guess we will have to wait for a proper crack. This update looks good too, can run it in windowed mode as well, something I really want in this game :)
serial for 1.02 version??

what a load of crap, tried to copy and paste crack ms-dos just refuses (don't ask why?) i spent ages looking for a crack came across, a couple done by SKIDROW but the stupid fuckers put a password on them what a waste of fucking time

Regarding my comment above, you can download any .torrent file you find on google for 'Panzer Corps Walthers', and then add following trackers to it (in uTorrent, right click, go to properties, and then paste them):

udp://tracker.publicbt.com:80
udp://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80
http://tracker.thepiratebay.org/announce
http://genesis.1337x.org:1337/announce
http://exodus.1337x.org/announce
udp://tracker.openbittorrent.com:80/announce
udp://tracker.publicbt.com:80/announce

That's for the 1.02 patch.
Now if someone would upload the 1.04 and the new DLCs... :)
Run + r  via regedit   what that means?

@molderfox - sorry, I meant Win+R, meaning, hold windows key & press R, or just go to Start menu -> "Run", and then type in "regedit". Then you follow the rest of the instructions. 

But — do that only if you get the error I mentioned (happens when the key in the game dir and the key in the registry are different).

Btw, I managed to crack the installer for the new patch (1.04), might upload the extracted files later.

It would be great if someone could also upload the DLCs.

@nepenthe6
It would be awesome if you could upload the 1.04 version. It is a massive fix pack compared to the 1.02. cheers
nepenthe6---  thanks! works just fine!

this game works fine but the version is 1.0 and so it only lets u play so far before crashing, that's why there're updates. without the cracked updates this dl is a bit useless sadly cos it's a good game. if only someone  could come up with a cracked 1.05 [has anyone read the huge pages of instructions for installing the friggin 1.04 cracked upadte? i'm not even gonna bother with all that]. i have found a few links to cracked 1.05 but they are all bogus. even dl'd one but it was just the normal update that wanted a serial key.
